long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Best Chrome extension is Google Analytics Opt-Out that allows users to block tracking of their activities by Google Analytics across different websites. When you install and turn on this extension, there is an ability to improve one’s privacy by declining the tracking system that assesses the user’s activity on the internet.  

For those who are privacy-conscious or do not want to have their browsing behaviour monitored this extension guarantees that Google Analytics is down. 

Key Features 

Easy Activation: That’s why there is an option where you can disable the tracking of Google Analytics with just a single click. 

Real-Time Blocking: This one once activated ceases to track. 

Privacy Protection: Aims at ensuring that your browsing information is not exposed to Google Analytics. 

Global Reach: All websites tracking with Google Analytics have their blocks blocked. 

How to Use in Simple Steps 

Step 1: Open the Chrome browser and go to the Chrome Web Store and download the extension. 

Step 2: Mouse over the icon of the given extension in the browser’s toolbar. 

Step 3: Flip the switch to turn on Google Analytics blocking. 

Step 4: Surf the internet without compromising your privacy. 

Why It Is Useful 
 
Google Analytics Opt-Out is another useful tool for those people who are concerned with their privacy while browsing through the web and do not wish to allow websites to track and collect information about their actions. As the awareness of data leakage and privacy issues rises, this extension offers a rather straightforward means to eliminate one type of tracking that has been widely used on the web, namely Google Analytics. In this way users can go back to the driver’s seat for their personal information and use the internet with less risk. 

To Whom Is It Useful For? 

This extension is advantageous to users who value their privacy such as those who do not wish to be tracked and have advertisements based on their activities on the internet. This is also useful for developers, journalists, or activists who wish to decrease the amount of data that can be collected about them online. Furthermore, every user who is worried about his data will find this extension mandatory to protect the privacy of personal information. 

FAQs 

Q1: What is the mechanism of Google Analytics Opt-Out extension ? 
A: It prevents websites from sending data to Google Analytics thus avoiding tracking of your activity. 
 
Q2: Does this mean I have to activate the extension each time I am browsing? 
A: No, the extension will remain ON once you activate it and the only way it will be off is if you decide to turn it off. 
 
Q3: Will this extension impact on the functionality of the websites? 
A: No, it only disables the tracking by Google Analytics and has no effect on the website’s content and speed. 
 
Q4: Is it possible to turn off tracking only for some sites? 
A: No, this extension stops tracking using Google Analytics on all websites across the world.
